name: In the Castle
description:
~Story~
Legend has in the Enchanted Forest is a tower and at the top of that tower is a beautiful, long golden-haired princess trapped within. Any who are able to make it to the top of the tower and save the princess from her eternal prison will gain fame, fortune, and a beautiful royal bride. However, the tower she is locked in is imbued with powerful magic making it near impossible to get to the top. Many knights, princes, and heroes have all tried to save the princess, but all who have entered the tower never returned. It is your turn to try and save the princess, with little faith in yourself and not even wanting to save her you press on through the tower full of puzzles to try and reach the top.

~Features~
*Rapunzel -esque game
*6 different puzzles with easy difficulty, several featured from the stupefied event
*a short, slowly progressive story with a deep moral
*average playtime 5 minutes

If you don't have VX Ace RTP you can't play it, you can find the RTP download here: RTP
